author: Linus Tech Tips
description:
Thanks to LG for sponsoring! Check out the LG Smart Monitor Swing here: http://bit.ly/3HKbl6n
The LG Smart Monitor Swing features a 4K touchscreen, a versatile moving stand, and LG webOS — and yes, some of your setups from the Reddit contest are featured in this video 👀

Having multiple monitors can be a game-changer for productivity... until you have so many they start spilling off your desk! 
Linus and the team react to some of YOUR best, worst, and wildest multimonitor setups, and along the way test the line between enough, and too many by sending a few lucky submitters an extra monitor with a little help from our sponsor LG.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1622009-these-multi-monitor-setups-are-not-normal/

title: These Multi-Monitor Setups are NOT Normal
